name: Bitcoin for Pizza
description: Bitcoin for Pizza… do we really need to explain? The day is a historic marker for any crypto veteran. It was May 22nd, 2010 when Laszlo Hanyecz agreed to pay 10,000 Bitcoins for two delivered Papa John's pizzas. Now sitting at over USD $150, 000, 000 in value… that's gotta hurt! Bitcoin for Pizza brings a new age, cyber punk feel to the significant event- metallic pizzas, powered circuits. A casual long sleeved shirt, paired with a stylish face mask to fit the season.
